reviews.text: We stayed at the Scandic in Forssa for one night in July.
reviews.title: Not the quality I was expecting from a Scandic hotel

reviews.text: The hotel lobby and facade were renovated and nice, but the rooms, corridors and breakfast room were badly outdated. It could clearly be seen that the hotel has served as a popular party venue as the carpets were dirty and stained and the breakfast room still had some lights and decorations from a night club.
reviews.title: Cosy, average hotel in the centre or Forssa

reviews.text: The room we stayed in was large, but not very convenient. There was an old leather couch which was very uncomfortable to sit in and there was a very strong smell of detergent coming from the bathroom. At night we were woken by the sounds of people returning from the night clubs to their rooms.
reviews.title: Outdated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The garage was also inconvenient. We left the car on the low floor and had to take two different elevators and walk a long corridor to reach the hotel.
reviews.title: small and cosy hotel with spacious rooms, nice view and very reasonable price

reviews.text: On the whole the hotel did not live up to the expectations we had for a Scandic hotel. Next time we visit Forssa we will probably go to Rantasipi which, even though outdated and located outside of the centre, provides a more "balanced" experience.
reviews.title: Great service, so-and-so rooms
